languages.text: Это существо получает +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +10% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционной{/g} атакой. Оно также обретает способность к вампиризму и восстанавливает 50% от нанесенного атаками {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} урона в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: This creature gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Это существо получает +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +10% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционной{/g} атакой. Оно также обретает способность к вампиризму и восстанавливает 50% от нанесенного атаками {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} урона в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature gains +50% damage, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical hit chance for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

This creature gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

This creature gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}範囲攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+50%、+2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+10%を得る。また、ヴァンピリズムを得るとともに、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で受けたダメージの50%を{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}として回復させることができる。
languages.original_text: This creature gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃のダメージ50％、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}2、クリティカルヒット率10％を得る。また、ヴァンピリズムを得るとともに、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}で受けたダメージの50％を{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}として回復させることができる。

この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+50%、+2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+10%を得る。また、ヴァンピリズムを得るとともに、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で受けたダメージの50%を{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}として回復させることができる。

languages.text: 此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高2点，{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程攻击{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高10%。此外，此生物获得吸血效果，每当通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成伤害的50%。
languages.original_text: This creature gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物造成的伤害提高50%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高2点，远程攻击的暴击率提高10%。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}此外，此生物获得吸血效果，每当通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成伤害的50%。

此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高2点，{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高10%。此外，此生物获得吸血效果，每当通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成伤害的50%。

languages.text: Esta criatura gana +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico para sus {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataques a distancia{/g}. También gana vampirismo y recupera {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por valor del 50 % del daño de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura gana +50 % de daño, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +10 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico para sus ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}. También gana vampirismo y recupera {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por valor del 50 % del daño de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur erhält +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +10 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} für {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}. Sie erhält außerdem Vampirismus und kann 50 % des durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} verursachten Schadens als {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wiederherstellen.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur erhält +50 % Schaden, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +10 % kritische Trefferchance für {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriffe. Sie erhält außerdem Vampirismus und kann 50 % des durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} verursachten Schadens als {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wiederherstellen.

languages.text: Cette créature bénéficie de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique lors des {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaques à distance{/g}. Elle acquiert également Vampirisme et peut restaurer 50% des dégâts infligés par les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature bénéficie de +50 % de dégâts, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +10 % de chances d'infliger un coup critique lors des attaques à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g}. Elle acquiert également Vampirisme et peut restaurer 50 % des dégâts infligés par les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık; {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli saldırılarında{/g} +%50 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve +%10 kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Ayrıca vampirlik gücü elde eder ve {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarıyla{/g} verdiği hasarın %50'sini {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı olarak geri kazanır.

It also gains vampirism and can restore 50% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
